Your Canadian Dollars will stay in Canada when you pay for your subscription with a personal cheque drawn on a Canadian bank. Your cheque will be deposited in our Canadian cheque account and used to pay our Canadian suppliers. PLEASE MAKE CHEQUES PAYABLE TO JOHN NEAL. Pay in British Pounds with your personal cheque. Your cheque will be deposited in our British cheque account and used to pay our British suppliers. PLEASE MAKE CHEQUES PAYABLE TO JOHN NEAL.
